content:
How to use Mathlib.Tactic.Widget.CommDiag?

I would like to use some of the features implemented in PR: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/363
Check out the test file for an example of usage. Essentially you need to import the widget, and then use with_panel_widgets.

Wojciech Nawrocki said:

Check out the test file for an example of usage. Essentially you need to import the widget, and then use with_panel_widgets.

Thank you very much. I was able to see it in action.
Asei Inoue has marked this topic as resolved.
